titleStmt.title: SII 4.545: original edition by H. Krishna Sastri
No. 545. (A.R. No. 98 of 1892). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī ... vīrametuṇaiyākavu n=tiyākame Aṇi Ākavuñ ceṅkoloccik karuṅ kali ka
ṭintu kūṭalcaṅkamattu Āhavamallaṉai Añcuvittu vikkalaṉaiyuñ ciṅkaṇaṉaiyum Uṭaipuṟa
ṅkaṇṭu maṟṟavar māteviyaraiyum vastuvāhinamuṅ kaikkoṇṭu vīrasiṁhāsa- nattu Ulakamuḻutu
ṭaiyāḷoṭum vīṟṟirun=taruḷina kovirājakesaripanmarāna Uṭaiyār śrīvirarājendradevaṟku yāṇṭu
5 Āvatu keraḷān=takavaḷanāṭṭu Uṟaiyūrkkūṟṟattuk karuppūr veḷḷāḷan karuppūruṭaiyān nakkan
tiruvekampanāna Innāṭṭukku nampuceyta keraḷān=takaviḻupparaiyan Inṉāṭṭut tiruk kaṟ
kuṭi viḻumiyadevarkku vaitta tirunon=tāviḷakku Onṟukku nāḷ Oṉṟukkuc cūlattāl ne
y Uḻakkāka Āṇṭuvarai ney toṇṇūṟṟunāḻikku vaitta Āṭu 9 10 Ivvāṭu toṇ
ṇūṟum tirukkaṟkuṭi Ūromey kaikkoṇṭamaiyil can=tirātittaval Ittiruno
n=tāviḷakku nāṅkaḷe celuttakkaṭavomāka Ivvāṭu toṇṇūṟuṅ kaikkoṇṭo
m tirukkaṟkuṭi Ūrom . ḷa Itu śrīpanmāhēśvararakṣai .... karuppūrmaṉ kampaṉukku
kātalaṉcīr nakkaṉ viruppūr viḻumiyatevarkku tiruppūrviḷakku vaittut toṇṇūṟā ṭāṅkaḷitta
ān meyye Uḷakkaruttāl cāla vukantu ..
Digital edition of SII 4.545 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
